item.title: #TIL : Check vcl file syntax before restarting
item.description: Check vcl file syntax before restarting Like NginX, Varnish has a syntax checker function that helps us test the syntactic correctness. $ varnishd -C -f [vcl file path] Varnish will compile the file and output the result to stdout. If something goes wrong, it will throw a message like > Message from VCC-compiler: > Expected an action, 'if', '{' or '}' > ('input' Line 74 Pos 6) > vcl_hash(req.
